description.p: A small round shield made from wood or metal and carried in one hand. Wielding a buckler increases your Armor Class by 1. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

This "War Door" type shield can be made out of wood or metal and can be any of a number of shapes. Though too unweildy to allow the user of such shields to move with ease and subtlety, this grants unparalleled protection amongst shields and even allows the user to fully crouch behind the shield granting the benefits of full-cover.

Mithral is a light, flexible metal. A mithral chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the mithral version of the armor doesn't.
You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

description.p: While holding this shield, you can speak its command word as a bonus action to cause it to animate. The shield leaps into the air and hovers in your space to protect you as if you were wielding it, leaving your hands free. The shield remains animated for 1 minute, until you use a bonus action to end this effect, or until you are incapacitated or die, at which point the shield falls to the ground or into your hand if you have one free.
You have an additional +1 bonus to AC while holding this shield.
